name: Elibean Alliance
declaringWar: We do not wish for it to come to this, but your very existence threatens the safety of our people. Therefore, prepare for war!
attacked: What did we do to deserve this? By my blade, I shall not let your evil heart prevail!
defeated: Father, Lilina... please forgive me, for I have failed you all.
introduction: Greetings! I am Roy of Pherae, I represent Elibe as a whole. I am pleased to make your acquaintance.
neutralNo: We kindly refuse your humble offer.
afterPeace: It is great to hear that you seek peace as well. War is terrible for our people anyways. Let us continue this not for ourselves, but for our people, shall we?
tradeRequest: We are interested to have an exchange with you.
uniqueText: +3 Science and +5 Production from Antiquity Sites. Extra bonuses from Iron resources.
